kesekiwdayath sawamini mama ek sawapnayak mese ditimi-ajanawarnawu kalawrushabhayo satharadenek yukshakaramhayi satharadigin rajakshaganayata awuth wrusabhayukshaya balamhayi mahajanaya raswu kalhi yukshakarannawu aakara dakwa garjajana kota ee ee atha palayannaha, me palamuwanasawapnaya ditimi me sawapnayata wipaka kawaredayi wichaloya maha rajjuruweni mitawipaka thopasamayeth apasamayeth nowanneya, anagathayehi adharmamishatawu krupana rajadaruwan ha adharmamishata manushyayan samayehi lowa yahapatha peralanta patangathkalhi kusalaya pasubasa akusalaya uthsananawa kusalayata akusalaya mathuwa lowa pirihennawu kalayehi warshawa yahapathwa indura nowasneya meghapadayo sindennahuya sashyayo malanika wannahuya, eseheyin durbhikshawanneya, meghayo wasthak men sathara digin naga sathrin awwehi wanuwi aadiya themeyi yana bhayin athulu kota gath kalhi purushayan udalu ha pettigena ala amunu niyarabandinta nikmunukalhi wasnaaakaradakwa garjanakotakotawiduliya gasagasa andunwankalugon satharadena rajanganayata awuth poraarabhaya boho dena gonporadakumhayi raswukalhi pora annawu aakara dakwa thapla garjanakota porananama ee ee atha palayamen meghayo nowasama palayannahuya.

eejipthu mamiyak sohongatha kirime charithra ha piliweth miyagiya pudgalaya ewakata daru samaja thathwaya matha rada pawathi.sulu niladhariyek nam ,mamiya kuda sohon gabaka ho prabhu sohongabak ayinaka thaba athi bawa pene.eheth usas niladharinge ha owunge pawulwala samajikayange ‘mami‘ sithuwam ha katayamwalin alankruthawatina petika thula thanpath kara ebaduma sarasili sahitha sohon gabaka thabayi.esema parawo wani athi usas pudgalayange mami dara sitina abhyanthara petikawa bohowita raththaran ho watina lohayakin sada athi athara bahira petikawa athishayinma alankara karana lada “gal walin “ sakasa atha.mewani usas pudgalayange mami thanpath kirimedi pujakawarayeku wisin mini pettiye ho mamiye mukhaya pihiti sthanayata shuddha wu sarayatiyakin thattu kirime charithrayak thibi atha.ema kriyawe anuhasin miya giya pudgalayata idiri aathma bhawayedi husma ganime ha katha kirime hakiyawa labena bawata owunge wishwasaya wiya.
